
=head1 NAME

publication_ref

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 publication_id (integer) - 
 type (integer) - 
 fk (integer) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                              Table "gcis_metadata.publication_ref"
      Column     |  Type   |                          Modifiers                           | Storage | Stats target | Description 
 ----------------+---------+--------------------------------------------------------------+---------+--------------+-------------
  id             | integer | not null default nextval('publication_ref_id_seq'::regclass) | plain   |              | 
  publication_id | integer |                                                              | plain   |              | 
  type           | integer | not null                                                     | plain   |              | 
  fk             | integer | not null                                                     | plain   |              | 
 Indexes:
     "publication_ref_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "publication_ref_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (type) REFERENCES ref_type(id) MATCH FULL
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
